title: Introducing the Health Check Feature!

content.value: Monitor your site's health with Foudroyer.

content.content: We're thrilled to launch the new Health Check feature! Now you can easily monitor your website's health, receive alerts for issues, and get actionable insights to keep your site running smoothly.
Try it out today and ensure your site is always in top shape!

description: Monitor your website's health and get actionable insights with Foudroyer's new Health Check feature.
